definition.description: Bartleby's Core: a value object used to record metrics

elapsed.description: The elasped time since app started up.

requestDuration.description: The time interval in seconds from the time the request started to the time the request completed.

serializationDuration.description: The time interval in seconds from the time the request completed to the time response serialization completed.

totalDuration.description: The time interval in seconds from the time the request started to the time response serialization completed.
